00080             function                execute_script_line( $ScriptLine )
00081             {
00082                   try
00083                   {
00084                         $Params = get_package( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00085                         $Params->load_settings( $ScriptLine );
00086                         
00087                         if( $Params->get_setting( 'command' , '' ) === 'install_package' )
00088                         {
00089                               $PackageFilePath = $Params->get_setting( 'package_file_path' , '' );
00090                               $MasterPackageName = $Params->get_setting( 'master_package_name' , '' );
00091                               $MasterPackageVersion = $Params->get_setting( 'master_package_version' , '' );
00092                               
00093                               $this->install_package( $PackageFilePath , $MasterPackageName , $MasterPackageVersion );
00094                               return;
00095                         }
00096                         
00097                         throw( new Exception( 'Command '.$ScriptLine.' was not executed' ) );
00098                   }
00099                   catch( Exception $e )
00100                   {
00101                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00102                   }
00103             }

00135             function                get_master_package( $PackageFilePath , $MasterPackageName , $MasterPackageVersion )
00136             {
00137                   try
00138                   {
00139                         if( $MasterPackageName === 'auto' )
00140                         {
00143                               $Zip = new ZipArchive;
00144                               if( $Zip->open( $FileSource ) === true )
00145                               {
00146                                     $Conf = $Zip->getFromName( './install/cf_install' );
00147                                     if( $Conf === false )
00148                                     {
00149                                           $Settings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00150                                           $Settings->load_setings( $Conf );
00151                                           $MasterPackageName = $Settings->get_setting( 'master_package_name' , '/' );
00152                                           $MasterPackageVersion = $Settings->get_setting( 'master_package_version' , 'last' );
00153                                     }
00154                                     
00155                                     $Zip->close();
00156                               }
00157                         }
00158                         
00159                         return( array( $MasterPackageName , $MasterPackageVersion ) );
00160                   }
00161                   catch( Exception $e )
00162                   {
00163                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00164                   }
00165             }

00193             function                install_package( $PackageFilePath , $MasterPackageName , $MasterPackageVersion )
00194             {
00195                   try
00196                   {
00197                         list( $MasterPackageName , $MasterPackageVersion ) = $this->get_master_package( 
00198                               $PackageFilePath , $MasterPackageName , $MasterPackageVersion
00199                         );
00200                         
00201                         if( $MasterPackageName === '/' )
00202                         {
00203                               $ROOT_DIR = INSTALL_DIR;
00204                         }
00205                         else
00206                         {
00207                               $ROOT_DIR = _get_root_dir( $MasterPackageName , $MasterPackageVersion , INSTALL_DIR );
00208                               $ROOT_DIR = _get_package_path( $MasterPackageName , $MasterPackageVersion , $ROOT_DIR );
00209                         }
00210                         
00211                         $PackageFolder = _install_package( $PackageFilePath , $ROOT_DIR );
00212 
00213                         $PageComposer = get_package( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00214                         $PageComposer->add_success_message( 'package_was_installed' );
00215                         
00216                         _drop_core_cache();
00217                   }
00218                   catch( Exception $e )
00219                   {
00220                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00221                   }
00222             }

00250             function                get_package_time( $Directory , $TimeFunc = '' )
00251             {
00252                   try
00253                   {
00254                         $Utilities = get_package( 'utilities' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00255                         $Files = $Utilities->get_files_from_directory( $Directory );
00256 
00257                         if( count( $Files ) )
00258                         {
00259                               $Time = $TimeFunc( $Files[ 0 ] );
00260                               foreach( $Files as $k => $v )
00261                               {
00262                                     $Tmp = $TimeFunc( $v );
00263                                     if( $Tmp > $Time )
00264                                     {
00265                                           $Time = $Tmp;
00266                                     }
00267                               }
00268                               
00269                               return( $Time );
00270                         }
00271 
00272                         return( false );
00273                   }
00274                   catch( Exception $e )
00275                   {
00276                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00277                   }
00278             }

00298             function                get_packages_list()
00299             {
00300                   try
00301                   {
00302                         $List = _get_packages_list();
00303                         
00304                         foreach( $List as $i => $l )
00305                         {
00306                               $RootDir = _get_root_dir( $l[ 'package_name' ] , $l[ 'package_version' ] , INSTALL_DIR );
00307                               $PackagePath = _get_package_path( $l[ 'package_name' ] , $l[ 'package_version' ] , $RootDir );
00308                               
00309                               $FileMTime = $this->get_package_time( $PackagePath , 'filemtime' );
00310                               $List[ $i ][ 'modify_date' ] = date( 'Y-m-d&\nb\sp;G:i:s' , $FileMTime );
00311                               
00312                               $FileATime = $this->get_package_time( $PackagePath , 'fileatime' );
00313                               $List[ $i ][ 'access_date' ] = date( 'Y-m-d&\nb\sp;G:i:s' , $FileATime );
00314                         }
00315                         
00316                         return( $List );
00317                   }
00318                   catch( Exception $e )
00319                   {
00320                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00321                   }
00322             }

00422             function                get_packages_tree( $List = false )
00423             {
00424                   try
00425                   {
00426                         if( $List === false )
00427                         {
00428                               $List = _get_packages_tree();
00429                         }
00430 
00431                         foreach( $List as $i => $l )
00432                         {
00433                               $List[ $i ][ 'subpackages' ] = $this->get_packages_tree( $List[ $i ][ 'subpackages' ] );
00434                               $List[ $i ][ 'meta' ] = $this->get_meta_files( $List[ $i ] );
00435                               $List[ $i ][ 'conf' ] = $this->get_config_files( $List[ $i ] );
00436                         }
00437                         
00438                         return( $List );
00439                   }
00440                   catch( Exception $e )
00441                   {
00442                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00443                   }
00444             }

00480             function                select_packages( $Start , $Limit , $Field = false , $Order = false )
00481             {
00482                   try
00483                   {
00484                         $List = $this->get_all_packages();
00485                         if( $Order !== false )
00486                         {
00487                               $SortSign = $Order === 'ascending' ? '<' : '>';
00488                               $SortFunc = create_function( 
00489                                     '$a , $b' , 
00490                                     "if( \$a[ '$Field' ] == \$b[ '$Field' ] )return(0);".
00491                                           "return( \$a[ '$Field' ] $SortSign \$b[ '$Field' ] ? -1 : 1 );"
00492                               );
00493                               usort( $List , $SortFunc );
00494                         }
00495                         
00496                         $Ret = array();
00497                         foreach( $List as $i => $l )
00498                         {
00499                               if( $i >= $Start && $i < $Start + $Limit )
00500                               {
00501                                     $Ret [] = $l;
00502                               }
00503                         }
00504                         return( $Ret );
00505                   }
00506                   catch( Exception $e )
00507                   {
00508                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00509                   }
00510             }
00511       }
